name: 陳文學
objective:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：
常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，特殊函數及級數解
schedule:
Week 1  First Order Differential Equations, Preliminary Concepts
Week 2  Separable Equations, Linear Differential Equations
Week 3  Exact Differential Equations, Integrating Factors
Week 4  Homogeneous, Bernoulli, Reccati Equations and Applications of Electrical Circuits
Week 5  Second Order Differential Equations, Preliminary Concepts
Week 6  Theory of Solutions, Reduction of Order
Week 7  The Constant Coefficient Homogeneous Linear Equations, Euler Equations
Week 8  The Nonhomogeneous Equation
Week 9 Application of Second Order Differential Equations, Midterm Exam
Week 10 The Laplace Transform, Definition and Properties
Week 11 Solution of Initial Value Problems, Shifting Theorems
Week 12 Convolution Theorem, Unit Impulses and The Dirac Delta Function
Week 13 Laplace Transform Solution of Systems
Week 14 Differential Equations with Polynomial Coefficients
Week 15 Series Solution, Initial Value Problems
Week 16 Using Recurrence Relations
Week 17 Singular points and the Method of Frobenius
Week 18 Second Solutions and Logarithm Factors, Final Exam.
materials:
Textbook: Advanced Engineering Mathematics 6th Edition
Peter V. O’Neil
Reference Book：Differential Equations with Boundary-Value Problems 6th Ed.
Dennis G. Zill and Michael R. Cullen
